    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    EvenBoss
    Represents the EvenBoss, called Cyfartal, boss entity in the game.
    The EvenBoss is the first boss of the game.
    class 
    FlyingBoss
    Represents the FlyingBoss, called Flygande, boss entity in the game.
    The EvenBoss is the second boss of the game.
    class 
    HalverBoss
    Represents the HalverBoss, called Leth, Boss entity in the game.
    The EvenBoss is the second boss of the game.
